metadata.description: Essential Chinese vocabulary for dining out, ordering food, and restaurant interactions

content.name: restaurant
content.side_d: Noun for a place where meals are served

content.name: seem
content.side_d: Verb indicating appearance or similarity

content.name: seat
content.side_d: Noun for a place to sit

content.name: waiter
content.side_d: Noun for restaurant service staff

content.name: table
content.side_d: Noun for furniture used for dining

content.name: order_food
content.side_d: Verb-object phrase for selecting dishes at a restaurant

content.name: plate
content.side_d: Noun and measure word for dishes of food

content.name: dumplings
content.side_d: Noun for Chinese dumplings with vegetable and/or meat filling

content.name: vegetarian
content.side_d: Adjective describing meatless food

content.name: home_style
content.side_d: Noun describing traditional home cooking style

content.name: tofu
content.side_d: Noun for a food made from soybeans

content.name: put
content.side_d: Verb for placing or adding ingredients

content.name: meat
content.side_d: Noun for animal flesh used as food

content.name: bowl
content.side_d: Noun and measure word for bowls of food

content.name: hot_sour_soup
content.side_d: Noun for a traditional Chinese soup

content.name: msg
content.side_d: Noun for a flavor enhancer

content.name: salt
content.side_d: Noun for a common seasoning

content.name: bok_choy
content.side_d: Noun for a Chinese leafy vegetable

content.name: just
content.side_d: Adverb meaning something just happened

content.name: sold_out
content.side_d: Verb-complement phrase indicating no more available

content.name: green_vegetable
content.side_d: Noun for green leafy vegetables

content.name: iced_tea
content.side_d: Noun for cold tea beverage

content.name: thirsty
content.side_d: Adjective describing the need for water

content.name: some
content.side_d: Measure word for an unspecified quantity

content.name: enough
content.side_d: Adjective meaning sufficient quantity

content.name: hungry
content.side_d: Adjective describing the need for food

content.name: serve_food
content.side_d: Verb-object phrase for bringing dishes to the table
